🚀 My Projects

Here’s a selection of my favorite web development projects — each built with modern technologies, clean architecture, and a focus on great user experience. Explore live demos or check the code on GitHub to see how I work.

AI Fitness Trainer

A productivity app built with React TypeScript and Firebase and deployed on Vercel serverless.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

Fransons Snickeri

A modern and responsive web application for a snickeri business, built using Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

La Bambi

A restaurant single-page app built with Next.js, featuring i18n, Google Maps, and PWA support.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

TodoList App

A React TypeScript app for managing tasks with timestamps, authors, and sorting features.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

Cocktail App

A React TypeScript app that serves as a cocktail encyclopedia with search, favorites, and details.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

Cheat Sheet

A fullstack app for organizing programming cheatsheets and snippets, built with React, TypeScript, and Express.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

Portfolio Website

My personal portfolio showcasing projects and professional experience, designed with clean CSS architecture.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code

Modbus Dashboard

A real-time dashboard for monitoring Modbus data built with Spring Boot, SQLite, and React.

🌐 Live Demo 💻 View Code
